name: Radio Indya
overview:
Listen to free Bollywood & Punjabi music on Radio Indya!

How many times have you felt the need for a self-shuffling playlist of Bollywood songs ? A place where you just hit play once and the playlist goes on and on through an array of some of your favorite Bollywood songs, old and new. Well, here is the answer! radioindya.com.

What’s better is that If you have a sudden craving for a really special song and you want to hear it right now! just type in the name of the song into the super efficient search engine with a database of thousands of songs, and let us do the rest.

Its trained to learn what to play and what to skip once you start using it. At a party with friends, at work, while studying, while working out or anywhere else. If you need Bollywood music, RadioIndya is the best place to be.
